creator: prasad.subramanian@sun.com
text:
If a tag handler implements BodyTag or extends BodyTagSupport
,EVAL_BODY_INCLUDE  should be valid return value form the doStartTag() method.
However the following exception occurs:


A Servlet Exception Has Occurred

Exception Report:

javax.servlet.ServletException: Since tag handler class tlitertag.BodyListTag
implements BodyTag, it can't return Tag.EVAL_BODY_INCLUDE



The JSP1.2 Spec says in section 10.2.2:
a tag handler that implemenst BodyTag is treated as one that implements
Itetation tag except that doStartTag method can return  SKIP_BODY,
EVAL_BODY_INCLUDE,EVAL_BODY_BUFFERED.
If EVAL_BODY_INCLUDE is returned then evaluation happens as if in IterationTag.

Remove the run-time error message caused if EVAL_BODY_INCLUDE is returned. Fixed
in Tomcat 4.0
creator: justyna.horwat@sun.com
